dublin_core.dcvalue: Modern communication and information technologies are ubiquitous nowadays and the medical field is no exception Telemedicine is a reasonable way to prevent accidents communicate faster in an emergency and improve medical care in the hospital Home aftercare benefits from this development too the use of networks started by the electronic health card can help reduce costs This article highlights these subjects and discusses national and international structures that promote the spread of health telematics Barriers to this path are also shown
